body.p: We the undersigned, citizens of Jefferson County, and City of Louisville would moust respectfully join in the prayer of the petitions William Beck and Charles Reel, and recommend them to your honer as proper objects of executive clemency.

I am well acquainted with both petitioners and especially with Mr. Charles Reel, who has been in my employ for the last eighteen months. -- He has during my acquaintance with him been a faithfull industrious and hardworking man, and therefore recommend him to your clemency

Geo. P. Doern

The Petitioners both sustain a good character for Industry, & Sobriety & Stand well with their Neighbors.

Louisville City Ct
